df-pco
blocks.content: Define the concatenation of two paths in a topological space ` J ` . For simplicity of definition, we define it on all paths, not just those whose endpoints line up. Definition of [Hatcher] p. 26. Hatcher denotes path concatenation with a square dot; other authors, such as Munkres, use a star. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 15-Jun-2010.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-pco(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cpco, cmpt(s0, ctop, cmpo(s1, s2, co(cii, ccn, cv(s0)), co(cii, ccn, cv(s0)), cmpt(s3, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cif(cfv(cv(s1), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s3))), cfv(cv(s2), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s3)), cmin, nat1)), wbr(cv(s3), cle, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-pco(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ *p =(s0 ‚àà Top ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà(II[Cn]s0), s2 ‚àà(II[Cn]s0)‚Ü¶(s3 ‚àà(0[[,]]1)‚Ü¶ if(s3[‚â§](1[√∑]2),(s1 `(2[√ó]s3)),(s2 `((2[√ó]s3)[-]1))))))
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
}

blocks.name: df-om1
blocks.content: Define the loop space of a topological space, with a magma structure on it given by concatenation of loops. This structure is not a group, but the operation is compatible with homotopy, which allows the homotopy groups to be defined based on this operation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jul-2015.)

blocks.name: df-omn
blocks.content: Define the n-th iterated loop space of a topological space. Unlike ` Om1 ` this is actually a _pointed_ topological space, which is to say a tuple of a topological space (a member of ` TopSp ` , not ` Top ` ) and a point in the space. Higher loop spaces select the constant loop at the point from the lower loop space for the distinguished point. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-omn(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(comn, cmpo(s0, s1, ctop, cuni(cv(s0)), cseq(nat0, ccom(cmpo(s2, s3, universe, universe, cop(co(cfv(ctopn, cfv(c1st, cv(s2))), comi, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2))), cxp(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), csn(cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)))))), c1st), cop(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cuni(cv(s0))), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cv(s0))), cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-omn(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ OmN =(s0 ‚àà Top, s1 ‚àà ‚ãÉ s0 ‚Ü¶ seq(0(((s2 ‚àà ùïå, s3 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ <((TopOpen `(1st ` s2))[Om1](2nd ` s2)),((0[[,]]1)√ó {(2nd ` s2)})>)‚àò 1st), < { <(Base ` ndx), ‚ãÉ s0 >, <(TopSet ` ndx), s0 > }, s1 >)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
}

blocks.name: df-pi1
blocks.content: Define the fundamental group, whose operation is given by concatenation of homotopy classes of loops. Definition of [Hatcher] p. 26. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Feb-2015.)

blocks.name: df-pin
blocks.content: Define the n-th homotopy group, which is formed by taking the ` n ` -th loop space and forming the quotient under the relation of path homotopy equivalence in the base space of the ` n ` -th loop space, which is the ` n - 1 ` -th loop space. For ` n = 0 ` , since this is not well-defined we replace this relation with the path-connectedness relation, so that the ` 0 ` -th homotopy group is the set of path components of ` X ` . (Since the ` 0 ` -th loop space does not have a group operation, neither does the ` 0 ` -th homotopy group, but the rest are genuine groups.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-pin(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  |- wceq(cpin, cmpo(s0, s1, ctop, cuni(cv(s0)), cmpt(s2, cn0, co(cfv(c1st, cfv(co(cv(s0), comn, cv(s1)), cv(s2))), cqus, cif(copab(s3, s4, wrex(s5, co(cii, ccn, cv(s0)), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s5), nat0), cv(s3)), wceq(cfv(cv(s5), nat1), cv(s4))))), cfv(cphtpc, cfv(ctopn, cfv(c1st, cfv(co(cv(s0), comn, cv(s1)), co(cv(s2), cmin, nat1))))), wceq(cv(s2), nat0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-pin(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  ‚ä¢ piN =(s0 ‚àà Top, s1 ‚àà ‚ãÉ s0 ‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚Ü¶((1st `((s0[OmN]s1)` s2))[/s]if(s2 = 0, { < s3, s4 > | ‚àÉ(s5 ‚àà(II[Cn]s0),((s5 ` 0)= s3 ‚àß(s5 ` 1)= s4))},(~=ph `(TopOpen `(1st `((s0[OmN]s1)`(s2[-]1)))))))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
}

  mpt2ex(s0, s1, co(cii, ccn, c0), co(cii, ccn, c0), cmpt(s2, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cif(cfv(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s2))), cfv(cv(s1), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s2)), cmin, nat1)), wbr(cv(s2), cle, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))))

blocks.name: pcoval
blocks.content: The concatenation of two paths. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 15-Jun-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm pcoval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cfv(cpco, c1), c2), cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cif(cfv(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0))), cfv(c2, co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(cii, ccn, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, co(cii, ccn, c1)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cfv(cpco, c1), c2), cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cif(cfv(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0))), cfv(c2, co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))))), diffsw(s0, w0))
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c0, cfv(cpco, c1), c2), cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cif(cfv(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0))), cfv(c2, co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))))), wcel(c0, co(cii, ccn, c1)), wcel(c2, co(cii, ccn, c1)))
  ovmpt2a(hs0, hs1, c0, co(cii, ccn, c1), c2, co(cii, ccn, c1), cfv(cpco, c1), cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cif(cfv(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0))), cfv(c2, co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))), cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cif(cfv(cv(hs0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0))), cfv(cv(hs1), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))))
  mpteq2dv(s0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cif(cfv(cv(hs0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0))), cfv(cv(hs1), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cif(cfv(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0))), cfv(c2, co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  ifeq12d(cfv(cv(hs0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0))), cfv(cv(hs1), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)), cfv(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0))), cfv(c2, co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0))), cfv(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)))))
  fveq1(cv(hs0), c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)))
  adantl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)), cfv(c2, co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1))))
  fveq1(cv(hs1), c2, co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1))
  pcofval(hs0, hs1, s0, c1)
  mptex(s0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cif(cfv(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0))), cfv(c2, co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))))
  ovex(nat0, cicc, nat1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(cii, ccn, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cif(cfv(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0))), cfv(c2, co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)

  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cif(cfv(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0))), cfv(c2, co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)

  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, nat1)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: pcovalg
blocks.content: Evaluate the concatenation of two paths. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jun-2014.)

thm pcovalg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

blocks.content: The concatenation of two paths is a path. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 19-Jun-2010.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm pcocn(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cfv(cpco, c1), c2), co(cii, ccn, c1)))

blocks.content: Homotopy invariance of path concatenation. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 15-Jun-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Feb-2015.)

thm pcohtpy(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(co(c0, cfv(cpco, c1), c2), cfv(cphtpc, c1), co(c3, cfv(cpco, c1), c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, nat1), cfv(c2, nat0)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(cphtpc, c1), c3))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cfv(cphtpc, c1), c4))
} = {
  syl3anbrc(w0, wbr(co(c0, cfv(cpco, c1), c2), cfv(cphtpc, c1), co(c3, cfv(cpco, c1), c4)), wcel(co(c0, cfv(cpco, c1), c2), co(cii, ccn, c1)), wcel(co(c3, cfv(cpco, c1), c4), co(cii, ccn, c1)), wne(co(co(c0, cfv(cpco, c1), c2), cfv(cphtpy, c1), co(c3, cfv(cpco, c1), c4)), emptycls))
  pcocn(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  simp1d(w0, wcel(c0, co(cii, ccn, c1)), wcel(c3, co(cii, ccn, c1)), wne(co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c3), emptycls))
  simp1d(w0, wcel(c2, co(cii, ccn, c1)), wcel(c4, co(cii, ccn, c1)), wne(co(c2, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c4), emptycls))
  pcocn(c3, c1, c4, w0)
  simp2d(w0, wcel(c3, co(cii, ccn, c1)), wcel(c0, co(cii, ccn, c1)), wne(co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c3), emptycls))
  simp2d(w0, wcel(c4, co(cii, ccn, c1)), wcel(c2, co(cii, ccn, c1)), wne(co(c2, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c4), emptycls))
  3eqtr3d(cfv(c3, nat1), cfv(c4, nat0), cfv(c0, nat1), cfv(c2, nat0), w0)
  simprd(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, nat1), cfv(c3, nat1)), wceq(cfv(c0, nat0), cfv(c3, nat0)))
  syl(w0, wa(wceq(cfv(c0, nat0), cfv(c3, nat0)), wceq(cfv(c0, nat1), cfv(c3, nat1))), wbr(c0, cfv(cphtpc, c1), c3))
  phtpc01(c0, c1, c3)
  simpld(w0, wceq(cfv(c2, nat0), cfv(c4, nat0)), wceq(cfv(c2, nat1), cfv(c4, nat1)))
  syl(w0, wa(wceq(cfv(c2, nat0), cfv(c4, nat0)), wceq(cfv(c2, nat1), cfv(c4, nat1))), wbr(c2, cfv(cphtpc, c1), c4))
  phtpc01(c2, c1, c4)
  mpd(w0, wne(co(co(c0, cfv(cpco, c1), c2), cfv(cphtpy, c1), co(c3, cfv(cpco, c1), c4)), emptycls), wex(hs0, wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c4))))))
  sylanbrc(w0, wex(hs0, wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c4))))), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c3))), wex(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c4))))
  sylib(w0, wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c3))), wne(co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c3), emptycls))
  simp3d(w0, wne(co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c3), emptycls), wcel(c0, co(cii, ccn, c1)), wcel(c3, co(cii, ccn, c1)))
  sylib(w0, w3a(wcel(c0, co(cii, ccn, c1)), wcel(c3, co(cii, ccn, c1)), wne(co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c3), emptycls)), wbr(c0, cfv(cphtpc, c1), c3))
  isphtpc(c0, c1, c3)
  n0(hs0, co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c3))
  sylib(w0, wex(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c4))), wne(co(c2, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c4), emptycls))
  simp3d(w0, wne(co(c2, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c4), emptycls), wcel(c2, co(cii, ccn, c1)), wcel(c4, co(cii, ccn, c1)))
  sylib(w0, w3a(wcel(c2, co(cii, ccn, c1)), wcel(c4, co(cii, ccn, c1)), wne(co(c2, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c4), emptycls)), wbr(c2, cfv(cphtpc, c1), c4))
  isphtpc(c2, c1, c4)
  n0(hs1, co(c2, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c4))
  exdistrv(hs0, hs1, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c4)))
  exlimdvv(hs0, hs1, w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c4))), wne(co(co(c0, cfv(cpco, c1), c2), cfv(cphtpy, c1), co(c3, cfv(cpco, c1), c4)), emptycls))
  ex(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c4))), wne(co(co(c0, cfv(cpco, c1), c2), cfv(cphtpy, c1), co(c3, cfv(cpco, c1), c4)), emptycls))
  ne0d(co(co(c0, cfv(cpco, c1), c2), cfv(cphtpy, c1), co(c3, cfv(cpco, c1), c4)), cmpo(hs2, hs3, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cif(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs2)), cv(hs0), cv(hs3)), co(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs2)), cmin, nat1), cv(hs1), cv(hs3)), wbr(cv(hs2), cle, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c4)))))
  pcohtpylem(hs2, hs3, cmpo(hs2, hs3, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cif(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs2)), cv(hs0), cv(hs3)), co(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs2)), cmin, nat1), cv(hs1), cv(hs3)), wbr(cv(hs2), cle, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))), c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c4)))))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c4))), wceq(cfv(c0, nat1), cfv(c2, nat0)))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c4))), wbr(c0, cfv(cphtpc, c1), c3))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c4))), wbr(c2, cfv(cphtpc, c1), c4))
  eqid(cmpo(hs2, hs3, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cif(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs2)), cv(hs0), cv(hs3)), co(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs2)), cmin, nat1), cv(hs1), cv(hs3)), wbr(cv(hs2), cle, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))))
  simprl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c4)))
  simprr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c4)))
  isphtpc(co(c0, cfv(cpco, c1), c2), c1, co(c3, cfv(cpco, c1), c4))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c3))
  diff.hs1.c(co(c2, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c4))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c4)))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c3)))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wne(co(co(c0, cfv(cpco, c1), c2), cfv(cphtpy, c1), co(c3, cfv(cpco, c1), c4)), emptycls))
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(wne(co(co(c0, cfv(cpco, c1), c2), cfv(cphtpy, c1), co(c3, cfv(cpco, c1), c4)), emptycls))
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.c(c1)
  diff.hs3.c(c2)
  diff.hs3.c(c3)
  diff.hs3.c(c4)
  diff.hs3.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs3.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs2.w(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c4)))))
  diff.hs3.w(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c4)))))
}

thm pcohtpy(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[(*p ` c1)]c2)[(~=ph ` c1)](c3[(*p ` c1)]c4))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` 1)=(c2 ` 0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0[(~=ph ` c1)]c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2[(~=ph ` c1)]c4)
} = {
  syl3anbrc(w0, (c0[(*p ` c1)]c2)[(~ = ph ` c1)](c3[(*p ` c1)]c4), (c0[(*p ` c1)]c2)‚àà(II[Cn]c1), (c3[(*p ` c1)]c4)‚àà(II[Cn]c1), ((c0[(*p ` c1)]c2)[(PHtpy ` c1)](c3[(*p ` c1)]c4))‚â† ‚àÖ)
  pcocn(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  simp1d(w0, c0 ‚àà(II[Cn]c1), c3 ‚àà(II[Cn]c1), (c0[(PHtpy ` c1)]c3)‚â† ‚àÖ)
  simp1d(w0, c2 ‚àà(II[Cn]c1), c4 ‚àà(II[Cn]c1), (c2[(PHtpy ` c1)]c4)‚â† ‚àÖ)
  pcocn(c3, c1, c4, w0)
  simp2d(w0, c3 ‚àà(II[Cn]c1), c0 ‚àà(II[Cn]c1), (c0[(PHtpy ` c1)]c3)‚â† ‚àÖ)
  simp2d(w0, c4 ‚àà(II[Cn]c1), c2 ‚àà(II[Cn]c1), (c2[(PHtpy ` c1)]c4)‚â† ‚àÖ)
  3eqtr3d((c3 ` 1), (c4 ` 0), (c0 ` 1), (c2 ` 0), w0)
  simprd(w0, (c0 ` 1)=(c3 ` 1), (c0 ` 0)=(c3 ` 0))
  syl(w0, ((c0 ` 0)=(c3 ` 0)‚àß(c0 ` 1)=(c3 ` 1)), c0[(~ = ph ` c1)]c3)
  phtpc01(c0, c1, c3)
  simpld(w0, (c2 ` 0)=(c4 ` 0), (c2 ` 1)=(c4 ` 1))
  syl(w0, ((c2 ` 0)=(c4 ` 0)‚àß(c2 ` 1)=(c4 ` 1)), c2[(~ = ph ` c1)]c4)
  phtpc01(c2, c1, c4)
  mpd(w0, ((c0[(*p ` c1)]c2)[(PHtpy ` c1)](c3[(*p ` c1)]c4))‚â† ‚àÖ, ‚àÉ(hs0, ‚àÉ(hs1,(hs0 ‚àà(c0[(PHtpy ` c1)]c3)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(c2[(PHtpy ` c1)]c4)))))
  sylanbrc(w0, ‚àÉ(hs0, ‚àÉ(hs1,(hs0 ‚àà(c0[(PHtpy ` c1)]c3)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(c2[(PHtpy ` c1)]c4)))), ‚àÉ(hs0, hs0 ‚àà(c0[(PHtpy ` c1)]c3)), ‚àÉ(hs1, hs1 ‚àà(c2[(PHtpy ` c1)]c4)))
  sylib(w0, ‚àÉ(hs0, hs0 ‚àà(c0[(PHtpy ` c1)]c3)), (c0[(PHtpy ` c1)]c3)‚â† ‚àÖ)
  simp3d(w0, (c0[(PHtpy ` c1)]c3)‚â† ‚àÖ, c0 ‚àà(II[Cn]c1), c3 ‚àà(II[Cn]c1))
  sylib(w0, (c0 ‚àà(II[Cn]c1)‚àß c3 ‚àà(II[Cn]c1)‚àß(c0[(PHtpy ` c1)]c3)‚â† ‚àÖ), c0[(~ = ph ` c1)]c3)
  isphtpc(c0, c1, c3)
  n0(hs0, (c0[(PHtpy ` c1)]c3))
  sylib(w0, ‚àÉ(hs1, hs1 ‚àà(c2[(PHtpy ` c1)]c4)), (c2[(PHtpy ` c1)]c4)‚â† ‚àÖ)
  simp3d(w0, (c2[(PHtpy ` c1)]c4)‚â† ‚àÖ, c2 ‚àà(II[Cn]c1), c4 ‚àà(II[Cn]c1))
  sylib(w0, (c2 ‚àà(II[Cn]c1)‚àß c4 ‚àà(II[Cn]c1)‚àß(c2[(PHtpy ` c1)]c4)‚â† ‚àÖ), c2[(~ = ph ` c1)]c4)
  isphtpc(c2, c1, c4)
  n0(hs1, (c2[(PHtpy ` c1)]c4))
  exdistrv(hs0, hs1, hs0 ‚àà(c0[(PHtpy ` c1)]c3), hs1 ‚àà(c2[(PHtpy ` c1)]c4))
  exlimdvv(hs0, hs1, w0, (hs0 ‚àà(c0[(PHtpy ` c1)]c3)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(c2[(PHtpy ` c1)]c4)), ((c0[(*p ` c1)]c2)[(PHtpy ` c1)](c3[(*p ` c1)]c4))‚â† ‚àÖ)
  ex(w0, (hs0 ‚àà(c0[(PHtpy ` c1)]c3)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(c2[(PHtpy ` c1)]c4)), ((c0[(*p ` c1)]c2)[(PHtpy ` c1)](c3[(*p ` c1)]c4))‚â† ‚àÖ)
  ne0d(((c0[(*p ` c1)]c2)[(PHtpy ` c1)](c3[(*p ` c1)]c4)), (hs2 ‚àà(0[[,]]1), hs3 ‚àà(0[[,]]1)‚Ü¶ if(hs2[‚â§](1[√∑]2),((2[√ó]hs2)[hs0]hs3),(((2[√ó]hs2)[-]1)[hs1]hs3))), (w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(c0[(PHtpy ` c1)]c3)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(c2[(PHtpy ` c1)]c4))))

  adantr(w0, (hs0 ‚àà(c0[(PHtpy ` c1)]c3)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(c2[(PHtpy ` c1)]c4)), (c0 ` 1)=(c2 ` 0))

blocks.content: A constant function is a path from ` Y ` to itself. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Feb-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Mar-2015.)

thm pcoptcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  fveq1i(c3, nat0, cxp(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), csn(c2)))
  sylancl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(cfv(cxp(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), csn(c2)), nat0), c2), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(nat0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)))
  0elunit()
  fvconst2g(c2, c1, nat0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1))
  syl5eq(cfv(c3, nat1), c2, cfv(cxp(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), csn(c2)), nat1), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)))
  fveq1i(c3, nat1, cxp(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), csn(c2)))

blocks.name: pcoass
blocks.content: Order of concatenation does not affect homotopy class. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 19-Jun-2010.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 8-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm pcoass(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(co(co(c0, cfv(cpco, c1), c2), cfv(cpco, c1), c3), cfv(cphtpc, c1), co(c0, cfv(cpco, c1), co(c2, cfv(cpco, c1), c3))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(cii, ccn, c1)))

blocks.name: pcorev
blocks.content: Concatenation with the reverse path. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 19-Jun-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 20-Dec-2013.)

thm pcorev(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(cii, ccn, c1)), wbr(co(c2, cfv(cpco, c1), c0), cfv(cphtpc, c1), c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(c0, co(nat1, cmin, cv(s0)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cxp(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), csn(cfv(c0, nat1))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  simprd(wcel(c0, co(cii, ccn, c1)), wbr(co(c2, cfv(cpco, c1), c0), cfv(cphtpc, c1), c3), wcel(cmpo(hs0, hs1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(c0, cif(co(nat1, cmin, co(co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs1)), cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)))), co(nat1, cmin, co(co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs1)), cmul, co(nat1, cmin, co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1)))), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))))), co(co(c2, cfv(cpco, c1), c0), cfv(cphtpy, c1), c3)))
  pcorevlem(s0, hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cmpo(hs0, hs1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(c0, cif(co(nat1, cmin, co(co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs1)), cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)))), co(nat1, cmin, co(co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs1)), cmul, co(nat1, cmin, co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1)))), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))))), c2, c3)
  eqid(cmpo(hs0, hs1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(c0, cif(co(nat1, cmin, co(co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs1)), cmul, co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)))), co(nat1, cmin, co(co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs1)), cmul, co(nat1, cmin, co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1)))), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))))))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
}

blocks.name: pcophtb
blocks.content: The path homotopy equivalence relation on two paths ` F , G ` with the same start and end point can be written in terms of the loop ` F - G ` formed by concatenating ` F ` with the inverse of ` G ` . Thus, all the homotopy information in ` ~=ph `` J ` is available if we restrict our attention to closed loops, as in the definition of the fundamental group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: om1val

  oveq12d(cv(hs0), comi, cv(hs1), c2, c3, wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))))
  simprr(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  fveq2d(cphtpc, cv(hs0), c2, wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))))
  simprl(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  eqtr4d(cuni(cv(hs0)), c4, cuni(c2), wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  adantl(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c2)))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c2)
  adantr(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(c4, cuni(c2)))
  syl(w0, wceq(c4, cuni(c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c4)))
  toponuni(c2, c4)
  syl(w0, wcel(c2, ctop), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c4)))
  topontop(c2, c4)
  ovexd(c1, cqus, cfv(cphtpc, c2), w0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1, cqus, cfv(cphtpc, c2)))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(co(c1, cqus, cfv(cphtpc, c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
}

thm pi1val(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 =(c1[/s](~=ph ` c2)))
  ‚ä£ c0 =(c2[pi1]c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c4))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(c2[Om1]c3)
} = {
  syl5eq(c0, (c1[/s](~ = ph ` c2)), (c2[pi1]c3), w0)
  ovmpt2dx(hs0, hs1, c2, cpi1, c3, (c1[/s](~ = ph ` c2)), ctop, ‚ãÉ hs0, ((hs0[Om1]hs1)[/s](~ = ph ` hs0)), c4, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, pi1 =(hs0 ‚àà Top, hs1 ‚àà ‚ãÉ hs0 ‚Ü¶((hs0[Om1]hs1)[/s](~ = ph ` hs0))))
  df-pi1(hs0, hs1)
  oveq12d((hs0[Om1]hs1), cqus, (~ = ph ` hs0), c1, (~ = ph ` c2), (w0 ‚àß(hs0 = c2 ‚àß hs1 = c3)))
  syl6eqr((hs0[Om1]hs1), c1, (c2[Om1]c3), (w0 ‚àß(hs0 = c2 ‚àß hs1 = c3)))
  oveq12d(hs0, comi, hs1, c2, c3, (w0 ‚àß(hs0 = c2 ‚àß hs1 = c3)))
  simprr(w0, hs0 = c2, hs1 = c3)
  fveq2d(cphtpc, hs0, c2, (w0 ‚àß(hs0 = c2 ‚àß hs1 = c3)))
  simprl(w0, hs0 = c2, hs1 = c3)
  eqtr4d(‚ãÉ hs0, c4, ‚ãÉ c2, (w0 ‚àß hs0 = c2))
  adantl(w0, hs0 = c2, ‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c2)
  unieq(hs0, c2)
  adantr(w0, hs0 = c2, c4 = ‚ãÉ c2)
  syl(w0, c4 = ‚ãÉ c2, c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c4))
  toponuni(c2, c4)
  syl(w0, c2 ‚àà Top, c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c4))
  topontop(c2, c4)
  ovexd(c1, cqus, (~ = ph ` c2), w0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c((c1[/s](~ = ph ` c2)))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c((c1[/s](~ = ph ` c2)))

blocks.name: pi1bas
blocks.content: The base set of the fundamental group of a topological space at a given base point. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 11-Jun-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm pi1bas(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cqs(c1, cfv(cphtpc, c2))))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c2, cpi1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, co(c2, comi, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c6)))
} = {
  3eqtr4rd(c0, cqs(c1, cfv(cphtpc, c2)), cqs(cfv(cbs, c6), cfv(cphtpc, c2)), cfv(cbs, c3), w0)
  qusbas(cfv(cbs, c6), cfv(cphtpc, c2), c3, c6, universe, universe, w0)
  pi1val(c3, c6, c2, c4, c5, w0)
  eqidd(cfv(cbs, c6), w0)
  fvexd(cphtpc, c2, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(c6, universe))
  ovexi(c6, c2, comi, c4)
  syl(w0, wceq(cqs(c1, cfv(cphtpc, c2)), cqs(cfv(cbs, c6), cfv(cphtpc, c2))), wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c6)))
  qseq1(c1, cfv(cbs, c6), cfv(cphtpc, c2))
}

thm pi1bas(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 =(c1 /.(~=ph ` c2)))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(c2[pi1]c4)

  ‚ä£ c6 =(c2[Om1]c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 =(Base ` c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 =(Base ` c6))
} = {
  3eqtr4rd(c0, (c1 /.(~ = ph ` c2)), ((Base ` c6)/.(~ = ph ` c2)), (Base ` c3), w0)
  qusbas((Base ` c6), (~ = ph ` c2), c3, c6, universe, universe, w0)
  pi1val(c3, c6, c2, c4, c5, w0)
  eqidd((Base ` c6), w0)
  fvexd(cphtpc, c2, w0)
  a1i(w0, c6 ‚àà ùïå)
  ovexi(c6, c2, comi, c4)
  syl(w0, (c1 /.(~ = ph ` c2))=((Base ` c6)/.(~ = ph ` c2)), c1 =(Base ` c6))
  qseq1(c1, (Base ` c6), (~ = ph ` c2))
}

thm pi1blem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wss(cima(cfv(cphtpc, c0), c1), c1), wss(c1, co(cii, ccn, c0))))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c0, cpi1, c3))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, co(c0, comi, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c5)))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wa(wss(cima(cfv(cphtpc, c0), c1), c1), wss(c1, co(cii, ccn, c0)))), wceq(c2, co(c0, cpi1, c3)))

  ssrdv(hs0, cima(cfv(cphtpc, c0), c1), c1, w0)
  syl5bi(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(cfv(cphtpc, c0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wrex(hs1, c1, wbr(cv(hs1), cfv(cphtpc, c0), cv(hs0))))
  elima(hs1, cv(hs0), cfv(cphtpc, c0), c1)
  vex(hs0)
  rexlimdvaa(hs1, c1, w0, wbr(cv(hs1), cfv(cphtpc, c0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  mpbir3and(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wbr(cv(hs1), cfv(cphtpc, c0), cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), co(cii, ccn, c0)), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), nat0), c3), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), nat1), c3))
  simp2d(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wbr(cv(hs1), cfv(cphtpc, c0), cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(cii, ccn, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(cii, ccn, c0)), wne(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cphtpy, c0), cv(hs0)), emptycls))
  adantrl(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wbr(cv(hs1), cfv(cphtpc, c0), cv(hs0)), w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), co(cii, ccn, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(cii, ccn, c0)), wne(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cphtpy, c0), cv(hs0)), emptycls)))
  sylib(wa(w0, wbr(cv(hs1), cfv(cphtpc, c0), cv(hs0))), w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), co(cii, ccn, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(cii, ccn, c0)), wne(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cphtpy, c0), cv(hs0)), emptycls)), wbr(cv(hs1), cfv(cphtpc, c0), cv(hs0)))
  simpr(w0, wbr(cv(hs1), cfv(cphtpc, c0), cv(hs0)))
  isphtpc(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0))
  eqtr3d(cfv(cv(hs0), nat0), c3, cfv(cv(hs1), nat0), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wbr(cv(hs1), cfv(cphtpc, c0), cv(hs0)))))
  simpld(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wbr(cv(hs1), cfv(cphtpc, c0), cv(hs0)))), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), nat0), cfv(cv(hs0), nat0)), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), nat1), cfv(cv(hs0), nat1)))
  simp2d(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wbr(cv(hs1), cfv(cphtpc, c0), cv(hs0)))), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), nat0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), co(cii, ccn, c0)), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), nat1), c3))
  eqtr3d(cfv(cv(hs0), nat1), c3, cfv(cv(hs1), nat1), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wbr(cv(hs1), cfv(cphtpc, c0), cv(hs0)))))
  simprd(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wbr(cv(hs1), cfv(cphtpc, c0), cv(hs0)))), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), nat1), cfv(cv(hs0), nat1)), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), nat0), cfv(cv(hs0), nat0)))
  ad2antll(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wbr(cv(hs1), cfv(cphtpc, c0), cv(hs0)), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), nat0), cfv(cv(hs0), nat0)), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), nat1), cfv(cv(hs0), nat1))))
  phtpc01(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0))
  simp3d(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wbr(cv(hs1), cfv(cphtpc, c0), cv(hs0)))), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), nat1), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), co(cii, ccn, c0)), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), nat0), c3))
  adantrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wbr(cv(hs1), cfv(cphtpc, c0), cv(hs0)), w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), co(cii, ccn, c0)), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), nat0), c3), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), nat1), c3)))
  biimpa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c1), w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), co(cii, ccn, c0)), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), nat0), c3), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), nat1), c3)))
  om1elbas(cv(hs1), c1, c0, c3, c5, c4, w0)
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wbr(cv(hs1), cfv(cphtpc, c0), cv(hs0))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), co(cii, ccn, c0)), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), nat0), c3), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), nat1), c3))))
  ssrdv(hs0, c1, co(cii, ccn, c0), w0)
  syl6bi(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), co(cii, ccn, c0)), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), co(cii, ccn, c0)), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), nat0), c3), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), nat1), c3)))
  om1elbas(cv(hs0), c1, c0, c3, c5, c4, w0)
  simp1(wcel(cv(hs0), co(cii, ccn, c0)), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), nat0), c3), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), nat1), c3))
  diff.hs0.c(cima(cfv(cphtpc, c0), c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cphtpc, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  diff.hs0.c(co(cii, ccn, c0))

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(((~=ph ` c0)" c1)‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ(II[Cn]c0)))

  ‚ä£ c5 =(c0[Om1]c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c6 =(Base ` c2))

} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(((~ = ph ` c0)" c1)‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ(II[Cn]c0))), c2 =(c0[pi1]c3))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(((~ = ph ` c0)" c1)‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ(II[Cn]c0))), (w0 ‚Üí c6 =(Base ` c2)))

  mpbir3and((w0 ‚àß(hs1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs1[(~ = ph ` c0)]hs0)), hs0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà(II[Cn]c0), (hs0 ` 0)= c3, (hs0 ` 1)= c3)

  adantrl(w0, hs1 ‚àà c1, hs1[(~ = ph ` c0)]hs0, (hs1 ‚àà(II[Cn]c0)‚àß hs0 ‚àà(II[Cn]c0)‚àß(hs1[(PHtpy ` c0)]hs0)‚â† ‚àÖ))
  sylib((w0 ‚àß hs1[(~ = ph ` c0)]hs0), (hs1 ‚àà(II[Cn]c0)‚àß hs0 ‚àà(II[Cn]c0)‚àß(hs1[(PHtpy ` c0)]hs0)‚â† ‚àÖ), hs1[(~ = ph ` c0)]hs0)

  isphtpc(hs1, c0, hs0)
  eqtr3d((hs0 ` 0), c3, (hs1 ` 0), (w0 ‚àß(hs1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs1[(~ = ph ` c0)]hs0)))
  simpld((w0 ‚àß(hs1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs1[(~ = ph ` c0)]hs0)), (hs1 ` 0)=(hs0 ` 0), (hs1 ` 1)=(hs0 ` 1))
  simp2d((w0 ‚àß(hs1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs1[(~ = ph ` c0)]hs0)), (hs1 ` 0)= c3, hs1 ‚àà(II[Cn]c0), (hs1 ` 1)= c3)
  eqtr3d((hs0 ` 1), c3, (hs1 ` 1), (w0 ‚àß(hs1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs1[(~ = ph ` c0)]hs0)))
  simprd((w0 ‚àß(hs1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs1[(~ = ph ` c0)]hs0)), (hs1 ` 1)=(hs0 ` 1), (hs1 ` 0)=(hs0 ` 0))
  ad2antll(w0, hs1 ‚àà c1, hs1[(~ = ph ` c0)]hs0, ((hs1 ` 0)=(hs0 ` 0)‚àß(hs1 ` 1)=(hs0 ` 1)))

  adantrr(w0, hs1 ‚àà c1, hs1[(~ = ph ` c0)]hs0, (hs1 ‚àà(II[Cn]c0)‚àß(hs1 ` 0)= c3 ‚àß(hs1 ` 1)= c3))

blocks.name: pi1buni
blocks.content: Another way to write the loop space base in terms of the base of the fundamental group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm pi1buni(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cuni(c0), c1))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c3, cpi1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, co(c3, comi, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c6)))
} = {
  eqtrd(cuni(c0), c1, cuni(cqs(c1, cin(cfv(cphtpc, c3), cxp(c1, c1)))), w0)
  unieqd(c0, cqs(c1, cin(cfv(cphtpc, c3), cxp(c1, c1))), w0)
  eqtrd(c0, cqs(c1, cin(cfv(cphtpc, c3), cxp(c1, c1))), cqs(c1, cfv(cphtpc, c3)), w0)
  pi1bas(c0, c1, c3, c2, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cqs(c1, cfv(cphtpc, c3)), cqs(c1, cin(cfv(cphtpc, c3), cxp(c1, c1)))), wss(cima(cfv(cphtpc, c3), c1), c1))
  simpld(w0, wss(cima(cfv(cphtpc, c3), c1), c1), wss(c1, co(cii, ccn, c3)))
  qsinxp(cfv(cphtpc, c3), c1)
  uniqs2(c1, cin(cfv(cphtpc, c3), cxp(c1, c1)), universe, w0)
  erinxp(cfv(cphtpc, c3), c1, co(cii, ccn, c3), w0)
  a1i(w0, wer(cfv(cphtpc, c3), co(cii, ccn, c3)))
  phtpcer(c3)
  simprd(w0, wss(c1, co(cii, ccn, c3)), wss(cima(cfv(cphtpc, c3), c1), c1))
  pi1blem(c3, c1, c2, c4, c5, c6, c0, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cin(cfv(cphtpc, c3), cxp(c1, c1)), universe))
  inex1(cfv(cphtpc, c3), cxp(c1, c1))
  fvex(cphtpc, c3)

} = {
  mpdan(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cec(c1, cfv(cphtpc, c2))), cec(co(c3, cfv(cpco, c2), co(c1, cfv(cpco, c2), c4)), cfv(cphtpc, c2))), wcel(c1, cuni(c7)))

blocks.name: pi1xfr
blocks.content: Given a path ` F ` and its inverse ` I ` between two basepoints, there is an induced group homomorphism on the fundamental groups. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: pi1xfrcnvlem
blocks.content: Given a path ` F ` between two basepoints, there is an induced group homomorphism on the fundamental groups. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Feb-2015.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm pi1xfrcnvlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(ccnv(c0), c1))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c3, cpi1, cfv(c4, nat0)))
  -| wceq(c5, co(c3, cpi1, cfv(c4, nat1)))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, crn(cmpt(s0, cuni(c6), cop(cec(cv(s0), cfv(cphtpc, c3)), cec(co(c7, cfv(cpco, c3), co(cv(s0), cfv(cpco, c3), c4)), cfv(cphtpc, c3))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c8)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, co(cii, ccn, c3)))
  -| wceq(c7, cmpt(s1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(c4, co(nat1, cmin, cv(s1)))))
  -| wceq(c1, crn(cmpt(s2, cuni(cfv(cbs, c5)), cop(cec(cv(s2), cfv(cphtpc, c3)), cec(co(c4, cfv(cpco, c3), co(cv(s2), cfv(cpco, c3), c7)), cfv(cphtpc, c3))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c7)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c6)
  -| diffsc(s2, c7)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {

blocks.name: pi1xfrcnv
blocks.content: Given a path ` F ` between two basepoints, there is an induced group homomorphism on the fundamental groups. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Feb-2015.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2016.)

blocks.name: pi1xfrgim
blocks.content: The mapping ` G ` between fundamental groups is an isomorphism. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Feb-2015.)

thm pi1xfrgim(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cgim, c2)))
  -| wceq(c1, co(c3, cpi1, cfv(c4, nat0)))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c3, cpi1, cfv(c4, nat1)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c0, crn(cmpt(s0, cuni(c5), cop(cec(cv(s0), cfv(cphtpc, c3)), cec(co(c6, cfv(cpco, c3), co(cv(s0), cfv(cpco, c3), c4)), cfv(cphtpc, c3))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c7)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, co(cii, ccn, c3)))
  -| wceq(c6, cmpt(s1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(c4, co(nat1, cmin, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cgim, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(ccnv(c0), co(c2, cghm, c1)))
  pi1xfr(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  simprd(w0, wcel(ccnv(c0), co(c2, cghm, c1)), wceq(ccnv(c0), crn(cmpt(hs0, cuni(cfv(cbs, c2)), cop(cec(cv(hs0), cfv(cphtpc, c3)), cec(co(c4, cfv(cpco, c3), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cpco, c3), c6)), cfv(cphtpc, c3)))))))
  pi1xfrcnv(s0, s1, hs0, c0, crn(cmpt(hs0, cuni(cfv(cbs, c2)), cop(cec(cv(hs0), cfv(cphtpc, c3)), cec(co(c4, cfv(cpco, c3), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cpco, c3), c6)), cfv(cphtpc, c3))))), c2, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  eqid(crn(cmpt(hs0, cuni(cfv(cbs, c2)), cop(cec(cv(hs0), cfv(cphtpc, c3)), cec(co(c4, cfv(cpco, c3), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cpco, c3), c6)), cfv(cphtpc, c3))))))
  isgim2(c0, c1, c2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)

  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)

thm pi1xfrgim(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpIso]c2))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(c3[pi1](c4 ` 0))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(c3[pi1](c4 ` 1))
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Base ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c0 = ran((s0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c5 ‚Ü¶ <[s0](~=ph ` c3),[(c6[(*p ` c3)](s0[(*p ` c3)]c4))](~=ph ` c3)>))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà(TopOn ` c7))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà(II[Cn]c3))
  ‚ä£ c6 =(s1 ‚àà(0[[,]]1)‚Ü¶(c4 `(1[-]s1)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c6)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c6)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpIso]c2), c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2), `' c0 ‚àà(c2[GrpHom]c1))
  pi1xfr(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  simprd(w0, `' c0 ‚àà(c2[GrpHom]c1), `' c0 = ran((hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ(Base ` c2)‚Ü¶ <[hs0](~ = ph ` c3),[(c4[(*p ` c3)](hs0[(*p ` c3)]c6))](~ = ph ` c3)>)))
  pi1xfrcnv(s0, s1, hs0, c0, ran((hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ(Base ` c2)‚Ü¶ <[hs0](~ = ph ` c3),[(c4[(*p ` c3)](hs0[(*p ` c3)]c6))](~ = ph ` c3)>)), c2, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  eqid(ran((hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ(Base ` c2)‚Ü¶ <[hs0](~ = ph ` c3),[(c4[(*p ` c3)](hs0[(*p ` c3)]c6))](~ = ph ` c3)>)))
  isgim2(c0, c1, c2)

  diff.hs0.c(c0)

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c10)))

  mp1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cuni(c1))), wcel(cec(cv(s0), cfv(cphtpc, c3)), universe), wcel(cfv(cphtpc, c3), universe))
